ThingDef.label: Infrared Scope
ThingDef.description: Specialist scope which comes with heat detecting visuals what allows for easier aiming at night and during unfavorable weather conditions.

ThingDef.label: Undermount Grenade Launcher
ThingDef.description: Undermount grenade launcher which functions as a seperate weapon. Allows for shooting grenade projectiles but needs to be refueled after use.

ThingDef.label: Undermount UV Laser
ThingDef.description: Rubber handle which can be easily attached under most guns. Its form allows for moderate recoil control and improved aiming times.

ThingDef.label: Semi-automatic Receiver
ThingDef.description: Specialist receiver which transforms bolt-action operated weapons into semi-automatic increasing rate of fire drastically.

ThingDef.label: Gun Link
ThingDef.description: Advanced sensors which synchronises the user with the weapon. It improves accuracy, aiming times as long as the user is wearing gun link.
